entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remotely debugging .NET 7 apps in linux-arm environments causes segmentation fault #81921
  • VectorNNN<T>.Sqrt missing test coverage and unspecified behavior #81915
  • [7.0] System.Net.Http.Json nuget issue in allconfigurations #81914
  • [wasi] `System.Collections.Tests` failing with `lock-free-alloc.c:374, condition 'next < LOCK_FREE_ALLOC_SB_USABLE_SIZE (desc->block_size) / desc->slot_size' not met` #81911
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] GC_Scenarios. DoublinkList failures in mono minijit linux arm64 #81909
  • [wasi] `System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException : Only the invariant culture is supported in globalization-invariant mode. ` #81908
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] JIT.HardwareIntrinsics failure in mono llvmaot linux arm64 - "System.Exception: One or more scenarios did not complete as expected." #81907
  • [QUIC] Missing `libmsquic` on tested platforms #81901
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `Perf_Vector128Of<Int64>.SquareRootBenchmark` failing with `float unrepresentable in integer range` #81900
    8.0.0
  • Running a System.Diagnostics.Process with both async stdout/stderr redirection blocks a ThreadPool thread #81896
  • DateTime.Now / DateTime.Today / ... impacts Android startup #81890
    8.0.0
  • Race in RuntimeTypeCache / metadata reading #81884
    8.0.0
  • Different behaviour of default interface impelmentation in monoVM vs CoreCLR #81882
    8.0.0
  • The `JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingDefault` in code summary comment misleading #81881
    6.0.x
  • The Parallel.ForEachAsync with synchronous source can block many threads #81877
  • [API Proposal]: Add Async Methods to IDataReader #81876
  • [API Proposal]: Cancel scopes #81874
    Future
  • How to set the maximum memory usage of a .net program #81872
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/COOL/rethrow/rethrow.sh #81869
  • 🎉 Annual dotnet/runtime community survey 2023 🎉 #81866
  • Unnecessary Trim analysis warnings for internal static fields of a RequiresUnreferencedCode class #81864

Closed

  • Wasm AOT can produce functions with too many parameters #76719
    Future
  • Remove the `OBJ(ADDR)` wrapping created for calls by the importer #51569
    Future
  • [6.0] CI failure in OSX: Unable to load shared library 'MovedNativeLib' in DllImportPathTest.sh #80476
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #81280
  • [release/6.0] The target framework 'net5.0' is out of support and will not receive security updates in the future #81850
  • [API Proposal]: An API to optimally encapsulate several searching algorithms and techniques, using one simple class #59649
    Future
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 Dot and Sum intrinsics on WebAssembly #75084
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add Vector128.Min and Max for WebAssembly #75094
    8.0.0
  • RegexGenerator sporadically failed to generate source in design time builds only #81891
  • `XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes` is ignored on writing `xmlns:*` attributes #74840
    Future
  • `XmlWellFormedWriter` ignores `XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes` for attributes specifically named `xmlns` #80306
    Future
  • Difference of Codegen in JIT ASM when using Negation / `if`-`else` block code #81479
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT should optimize "X & mask" to "(type)X" #36952
    Future
  • simpleprovidervalidation test failed with `Process is not supported on this platform.` #81897
  • JIT emits unnecessary movsxd instructions when calling into Span indexer #12218
    Future
  • Fix JSON issue (InvalidCastException) with ctor nullable enum ctor params having default values #68647
    8.0.0
  • Default value for optional ctor params should be used when matching prop is ignored #60082
    Future
  • Is there a way to combine custom converters from different projects? #81883
  • `Stopwatch.GetTimestamp` result different from windows and linux #81875
  • RyuJit: avoid conditional jumps using cmov and similar instructions #6749
    Future
  • Ignoring SSL certificate errors by using HttpClient does not work on linux-based systems (net6). #81794
  • Recommendation needed for using NuGet packages for .Net 6 target #81740
  • [wasm] Runtime test `simpleprovidervalidation.sh` failing on CI #81859

PullRequests

Created

  • Call SetLastError when MAPMapPEFile fails #81929
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatches #81928
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove dead code #81927
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
  • Remove extraneous output to console from our build. #81925
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Implement jiterpreter float-to-int conversions in C #81923
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Change the default createdump memory enumeration to the fast path #81922
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix the Mono part of #81600 #81920
    area-Build-mono
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Clean up targets, and merge with wasi targets #81918
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Move mono.mscordbi subset off the offical build #81917
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Pick some low-hanging fruit in LSRA throughput #81916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] rosly update test #81910
    NO-MERGE
  • CI: don't trigger *all* library tests on wasm-only changes #81906
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger]Trying to fix CI with chrome latest version #81904
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Adding support to mono for v128 constants #81902
  • [Android] Enable two networking tests #81895
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Try some relaxed interference checks #81892
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Parametrized macros for emitting arm64/neon opcodes #81887
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][wbt] Cache build output #81879
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Fix XmlSqlBinaryReader and introduce a corpus of SqlXml tests #81878
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Add ability to generate library and exe entry points #81873
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2109652 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Templatize fgAddRefPred #81865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Declare CoreClrPgoDataArg variable in CI script #80324
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove a number of unnecessary intermediate allocations in JsonMetadataServices. #81903
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Optimize out redundant null checks in the jiterpreter #81811
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix the net7.0 build when only net6.0 workloads are installed #81390
    area-Build-mono
  • Skip TestNativeLibraryProbingOnPathEnv on macOS #81856
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update arm queues #81858
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80553
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.4
  • Disable EnsureCleanEnvironment on wasm since it can't possibly work #81893
    arch-wasm, test-bug, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #81728
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Fix vector set_Item #81898
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81308
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.4
  • XmlWriter respects NewLineOnAttributes when writing xmlns #81822
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.4
  • Cache copies of register sets and data that varies with AVX512 #81868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] improve asset loading #81886
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Introduce insGroup/instrDesc backwards navigation #80840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81837
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • Force building of Mono manifest packages when building via source-build #81889
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix AllocateRegularStaticBox for FOH #81857
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80552
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.15
  • [7.0] Fix reporting of an async IO timeout error on Windows (`SerialPort`) #81745
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.4
  • [mono] Fix SIMD multiplication by scalar #81888
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Peephole optimization to skip emitting `movsxd` #81721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Transform SELECT(relop, 1/0, 0/1) to relop #81880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Supress Check EOL Target Framework #81848
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary performance, in particular for strings #81557
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools that are used by the repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • Fix a couple of JsonConstructor bugs & clean up JsonParameterInfo implementation. #81842
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Force building of Mono manifest packages when building via source-build #81790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix vector's Narrow intrinsics #81843
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] handle PDB files as asset type #81828
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix range check in LdelemaRef #81748
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove unused PHASE_COMPUTE_PREDS #81863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip `tracing/eventpipe/simpleprovidervalidation/` on wasm #81860
    test-failure, arch-wasm
  • JIT: add concept of edge likelihood #81738
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • evaluate-default-paths.yml: Add paths for wasi #81817
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81350
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #81295
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • Fix src/tests/build.sh argument processing #81836
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update heap hard limit for large pages #81292
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81250
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.x

Updated

  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Unpin the C# compiler version #81247
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81307
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.15
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasi: add workload packs, templates, and Wasi.Build.Tests #81849
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove duplicated code #81611
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.15
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [QUIC] Added tests to check IsSupported. #81481
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • Validate the Kept attribute against the presence of EEType in NativeAOT #81830
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` narrow-cast only #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace some single-char strings with chars #81831
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> is now intrinsic. #81695
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Allow root path for Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.SpecialDirectories #81861
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ds-ipc-pal-socket.c Windows build. #77840
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Remove errno check from the fallback in getexepath #81852
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Recent WASM package have some issues. #2196

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable the PI smoke test for WASM #2191

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Remove GT_PUTARG_TYPE #2195

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing dependency installing sdk 6.0 on Ubuntu 20.04 #30464
  • EnablePreviewFeatures does not work depending on working directory location when performing 'dotnet run' #30463

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Issue 25536 enable -disable-build-servers for pack, clean, test, msbuild #30481
    Area-NetSDK
  • Document `Workload Clean` Design #30480
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30477
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30475
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • GenAPI: update event declaration and reference parameters. #30476
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30454
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30417
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Filter out default member attribute for types with indexer. Implement filtering out base type and interfaces. #30394
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2109488 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: synthesize private fields for value types #30362
    Area-GenAPI
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Adding the linux feed removal to 6.0.1xx as I figured out the issue #30037
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: [I got true in `ReferenceEquals`, but a different result in using as for type conversion] #6955

Updated

  • Proposal/Discussion: Negation of if/while Condition #568
  • Higher Kinded Polymorphism / Generics on Generics #339
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify limitations around capturing of parameters that have ref-like type #6957

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0078 - Use pattern matching suggests incorrect code when comparing Int128 with Int64/32/16 #66787
  • Analyzer feature telemetry #66784
    Backlog
  • ILegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService does not provide an implementation in the workspaces layer #66779
  • Value Tracking should ignore optional parameters that aren't specified #66771
  • EnC API for method instrumentation #66770

Closed

  • Don't suggest name changes on [DllImport] tagged methods; all this can do is break code. #29335
    Backlog
  • inappropriate suggestion in Generate From Usage in VB.NET #29748
    Backlog
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis package to 2.9.0 is not straightforward. Missing MSBuildWorkspace #29375
    Backlog
  • remove trivia temproary stroage service #29111
    Backlog
  • ExtractMethodCodeRefactoringProvider #29088
    Backlog
  • With "Full Solution Analysis" turned on, certain syntax errors get duplicated #28808
    Backlog
  • Enable searching/filtering of member-selection dialogs (e.g. picking members to override) #28661
    Backlog
  • CSharpFormatting.ApplyEditorConfigAndFormatDocument Failure #28454
    Backlog
  • Expand Selection: Select all lines in block - separated by blank line #28336
    Backlog
  • Expand Selection: Select full line when only whitespace chars left #28335
    Backlog
  • FindAllReferences should handle `Add` methods used in collection initializers #28229
    Backlog
  • Quick info support for projection spans #28014
    Backlog
  • List of anonymous tuple peek defintion goes to struct #27936
    Backlog
  • LSP pull diagnostics should return nothing (except syntax error) prior to the workspace being fully loaded. #66761
  • MoveTypeCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error #27488
    Backlog
  • error's on razor doesn't navigate to razor file correctly #27485
    Backlog
  • Editor Completion: Do we show an empty description box instead of no description? #27420
    Backlog
  • Editor Completion: Allow empty string or null descriptions of suggestion mode items #27419
    Backlog
  • Adding .editorconfig breaks zoom in Visual Studio editor #27324
    Backlog
  • "Add parameter to constructor" ignores successive calls #27255
    Backlog
  • ObjectBinderSnapshot Index out of bounds if Deserialization is the first operation #27226
    Backlog
  • Class View flickers as code is edited #27183
    Backlog
  • Searching 'decompile' or 'decompiler' in quick launch returns no results #27171
    Backlog
  • generate member can generate new member that's already exist #27040
    Backlog
  • SyntaxEditorBasedFixAllProvider should enforce more consistent filtering patterns. #26944
    Backlog
  • Incorrect indentation in for loop #26935
    Backlog
  • TextstructorNavigator.TryFindLeaf NullReferenceException #26788
    Backlog
  • Completion of property in attribute shows wrong property when multiple properties exists #26768
    Backlog
  • Inlining a ref variable #26668
    Backlog
  • Use multiple workspace cache files #26664
    Backlog
  • "Introduce local" moves expression that uses an expression variable before its declaration #26473
    Backlog
  • Crash in AnalyzerDriver #26411
    Backlog
  • "IDE0017 object initialization can be simplified" leads to erroneous "CS0165 Use of unassigned local variable" #26317
    Backlog
  • [Performance] Should eliminate the calls for ProjectChanges.GetChangedDocuments() #26254
    Backlog
  • FileFromSameProjectTogetherTest hangs or fails sometimes #26244
    Backlog
  • flaky unit test: VisualStudioDiagnosticAnalyzerExecutorTests.TestCancellation #26183
    Backlog
  • Failed to clean up listeners: ReportEntireFileChanged SyntacticClassificationTaggerProvider.TagComputer.cs 217 #26144
    Backlog
  • Provide an API to notify the language service of pending code generation work #26125
    Backlog
  • Provide an API for mapping between generated source code and original Razor source code #26124
    Backlog
  • Tests invalid when language version default is 8.0 #26115
    Backlog
  • vb.net array length is 1 after call to c dll call used by byref variable #25979
    Backlog
  • Exception from quickinfo when hovering over an unnecessary cast #25966
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.SolutionCrawler.WorkCoordinatorTests.FileFromSameProjectTogetherTest #25931
    Backlog
  • Auto-complete in brackets #25873
    Backlog
  • Create a refactoring service for keeping user code style #25694
    Backlog
  • [Classification] Duplicate classification #25648
    Backlog
  • [Completion] Autopopup after += #25617
    Backlog
  • C# "create and initialize property" lightbulb gives "wrong" type #25587
    Backlog
  • Incorrect CS8774 when adding extra conditions that shouldn't affect nullable analysis #66773
  • Compiler no longer catches a whole class of programming errors due to the poor interaction of natural delegate types and generics #66772
  • Proposal: obsolete ISourceGenerator, SyntaxReceiver and all non-incremental APIs #65106
    17.6
  • GetProjectDependencyGraph doesn't return dependencies #66754
  • 'Make method async' should be offered even when await is parsed as a variable declaration #25446
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/29198 #66789
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Remove unused TS brace completion code"" #66781
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move fixer down to code-style layer #66780
    Area-IDE
  • Add tests for some "Primary Constructors" IDE scenarios. #66774
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Dev/toddgrun/request concurrency #66767
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Targeting IDE projects to .NET 6 #66655
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Cleanup some remaining traits in some tests. #66785
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66786
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move task list initialization code to BG. #66763
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add a comment to CodeFixContext.Options #66783
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add a test for FAR on symbol with empty name #66762
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66766
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Tweak LSIF's MSBuild discovery logic #66709
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Track status for "roles" feature #66746
    Area-Compilers
  • Discourage non-incremental source generators #66752
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Support 'make method async' on an unbound 'await' identifier parsed as a variable declaration. #66764
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66790
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow razor tests to get diagnostics #66748
    Area-IDE
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Update BCL versions to .NET 7 #66561
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix OnInitialized #66747
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Parsing for role and extension type declarations #66728
    Area-Compilers
  • Add nullability info field into discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove all partial analysis state tracking in CompilationWithAnalyzers #66750
    Area-Analyzers, Tenet-Performance
  • Remove CS1701 and CS1702 warnings #66313
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • upgrade 2.1 to 3.1 - Could not load type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.DataAnnotations.Internal.NumericClientModelValidatorProvider' from assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.DataAnnotations, Version=3.1.32.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' #46559
  • Add Claims to a user during login while using Identity #46558
  • Perf regression: plaintext #46557
  • Update test matrix for .net 8 #46555
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Can we use a BlazorApp without having the "_framework/blazor.server.js" reference added? #46554
  • SetBrowserRequestCredentials doesn't work in DelegatingHandler #46553
  • Strange behavior of minimal api when using it in fsharp #46551
  • ASP Net Core 7 project when deployed on Azure fails to bind model properly. #46550
  • Blazor Download Progress Should Take Into Account Bundle Size And Expose Real Download Information #46549
  • Session getting null when trafic increase on site #46547
  • Warning on use of regex constraints in route parameters. #46546
  • ASP.NET Core Module fails to load the runtime when the Null Service is stopped #46544
  • Horizontal tabs causing issues in header values #46543
  • Add RouteValueDictionary overloads to Http.Results #46542
    8.0-preview2
  • Add AOT flag to worker template #46541
  • Expose the original status code in StatusCodeReExecuteFeature #46538
  • HTTP/3: Enable platform smoke test on all platforms #46537

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #46469
  • Bad build Performance of project dependency chain with many StaticWebAssets #46272
  • InputText and other input components do not use SetUpdatesAttributeName() for two-way binding #40097
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #46525
  • Perf regression: https #46534
  • Limitation with using Multiple Cookie Authentications #46528
  • Generating new 2FA recovery codes fail when EFCore has QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTracking set globally #46464
  • IdentityFramework: VerifyUserTokenAsync() failed with purpose: "ResetPassword" for user. #46467
  • Google authentication not working #46256
  • Blazor initializer scripts are cached when they clearly have been changed- #46355

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to Helix 3.16 #46563
    area-infrastructure
  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor
  • Avoid accessing RequestServices & creating a logger in Utf8ContentHttpResult if no logging is being performed #46560
    area-runtime
  • Updated Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UserOptions.RequireUniqueEmail flag description. #46552
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • ProjectTemplates schema launch settings #46548
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • First pass at basic query string parameters. #46545
  • fix typo in log message #46540
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Expose the original status code in StatusCodeReExecuteFeature #46539
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2109414 #46556
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview2
  • Continuation of PR 40097 (Input components should use SetUpdatesAttributeName) #46434
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview2
  • Remove incorrect/unnecessary trimming suppressions. #46518
    8.0-preview2
  • Use Arcade's pool-providers.yml #46493
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Reduce allocations caused by Range operators on arrays and strings #46519
    8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure
  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-web-frameworks
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-alpha.1.23077.6` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • ServerComparison.FunctionalTests: extend nginx configuration so nginx starts on RHEL and Fedora. #46507
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add HTTP/3 test to verify platform support #46523
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing android emulator #13235

Closed

  • RowDefinition Height incorrect #8194

  • iOS: Publish failed with "_GenerateDSym" failure if specify "-o:{path to custom directory}" #13231

  • Application.Current.OpenWindow() creates a redundant instance of WebView #10436

  • 创建新项目时，找不到“MAUI”选项 #13075
  • Maui Blazor App :in (release process: "ipa" file ) project crashes on showing a nuget control #13016
  • IImage.AsBytes() takes float quality 0..1 but complains about quality not being 0..100 when 50 is entered #12158
    Backlog
  • .NET Maui on dotnet 7.0 Windows platform (WindowsApplicationSDK 1.1.5) crashes with System.ExecutionEngineException in Application.Start in Main #11546

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't refresh the filtered tests if the filter hasn't actually changed #13236

    area/single project ☝️

    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • [build] use stable bits in main #13201

  • [Android] Fix wrong conversions between Graphics RectF and Android RectF #13225
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Avoid to update Shell Toolbar colors if already disposed the Tracker #12539
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Align dash effect between Border and Shapes #12693
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS] Better Find Next Textfield Algo #13174
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 8.0-preview2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13217
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix crash setting SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage #12924
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • Wire up WebView2 to window life cycle #13206
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add more tests for Graphics #13208
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Add NotNullWhen to IsAlive() #13214

Updated

  • feat: Added nullable annotations for IValueConverter. #13173
    community ✨
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889

  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InMemory provider v7.x.x: FromSqlRaw throws InvalidOperationException: Query root of type 'FromSqlQueryRootExpression' wasn't handled by provider code. #30246
  • Query: incorrect results for complex predicate with bitwise AND operation with bool args #30245
  • Json column fails to materialize only when default interceptor used #30244
  • Include savepoint name in IDbTransactionInterceptor methods #30243
  • Survey: GitHub contributor experience 2023 for dotnet/efcore #30242
    Discussions
  • Prevent changing value of columns by attribute #30238
  • Allow generated class members to have same name as generated classes when casing differs #30237

Closed

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in SqliteConnectionFactory.PruneCallback #29952
    7.0.4
  • EF Core Throwing Exception with Successfully Inserting Record #30230
  • Adding a no-restore argument for building #30222
  • Include & cache entity types to model on-demand basis #30166
  • Enable execution strategy to control buffering independently of retries #30112

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Use default schema for TPC tables (#30214) #30241
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Prevent re-entrance into DetectChanges #30240
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Updated

  • Don't set table names from DbSet properties when Discriminator property is conflicted with the default but is then configured explicitly #30234
  • [release/7.0] Use correct provider type for nullable value type with converter #30219
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
